articles.author: Scroll Staff
articles.title: Amid Covid crisis, Modi’s popularity rating drops to a new low for first time in 7 years: Report - Scroll.in
articles.description: This was based on data from two surveys – one by Indian agency CVoter and another by American agency Morning Consult.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modis popularity ratings fell to a new low amid the coronavirus pandemic, according to surveys by an Indian and an American agency, reported Reuters.
